about.title: About Me
about.text: a Junior Full-Stack Web & App Developer, eager to learn and grow in my role. focusing primarily on Front-End development with a foundational understanding of Back-End technologies to facilitate seamless teamwork. My skill set includes:

projects.title: Projects
projects.agency: A minimalist agency website, crafted during the early stages of my learning journey.
projects.todo: A straightforward ToDo list website designed to help to jot down tasks effortlessly.
projects.cyber: An emulation of the renowned Hacker News platform, delivering the latest in geek news.
projects.tweetX: A simple rendition of the popular X platform (Twitter) . Express & post your thoughts seamlessly.
projects.ip: Explore your current location using your IP address or geo-location. & offers additional features.
projects.cook-book: Discover and curate your favorite foods along with their ingredients
